data.title: Brace Sproul | Applied AI Engineer
data.snippet:
# BRACE SPROUL

HEAD OF APPLIED AI @ LANGCHAIN

AI/ML Engineer heading LangChain's Applied AI team. Interested in agents, drones, and rockets.

## EXPERIENCE

LangChain AI

San Francisco

Head of Applied AI

March 2025 - Present

Leading LangChain's Applied AI team. Managing the development of agents, AI workflows, and fullstack AI apps.

Applied AI Engineer

October 2023 - March 2025

Maintainer of LangChain's open source AI TypeScript repositories, with millions of monthly downloads across all projects. Core engineer implementing LangChain's agentic use case projects.

Create Inc.

San Francisco

Tech Lead | Full Stack Engineer

October 2022 - October 2023

Core team member developing Create's code generation AI agent using OpenAI's GPT via LangChain. [...] ChatLangGraphUI

VIEW PROJECT

data.title: Introducing LLManager: Automate Approvals with Memory Agent
data.snippet:
# Introducing LLManager: Automate Approvals with Memory Agent

This title was summarized by AI from the post below.

Brace Sproul

 Report this post

üßç‚ôÇÔ∏èIntroducing LLManager - Automate Approvals Through a Memory Agent LLManager is an open source LangGraph workflow for automating approval tasks through memory. It's able to learn over time by using human-in-the-loop to assist with memory generation. I just released a video which takes a deep dive into its architecture, and why its useful:  See the open source repo here: 

157   6 Comments
